玹字的基本解释

玹
xuán
玉色。
似玉的美石。

玹
xián
姓。

玹字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xuán］
［《廣韻》胡涓切，平先，匣。］
［《廣韻》黄練切，去霰，匣。］
次于玉的美石。用作人名。汉代有赵玹。见《後汉书·蔡邕传》。

玹字的康熙字典解释

【午集上】【玉字部】　玹； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页729第03
【廣韻】黃練切【韻會】【正韻】熒涓切，?音縣。【廣韻】玉名。　又【廣韻】【集韻】?胡涓切，音懸。【玉篇】玉色。【廣韻】石次玉。　又人名。【後漢·趙岐傳】中常侍唐衡兄玹，爲京兆虎牙都尉。　又【集韻】胡干切，音賢。姓也。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xuán］
["Guangyun" Hu Juanqie, Pingxian, Xie. ]
["Guangyun" Huang Lianqie, go to ha, box. ]
Beautiful stone next to jade. Used as a person's name. There was Zhao Xuan in the Han Dynasty. See "Book of Later Han·Biography of Cai Yong".
Xuan
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Won Collection 1] [Jade Character Department] 　玹; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 729 No. 03
[Guang Yun] Huang Lianqie [Yunhui] [Zheng Yun] Yingjuanqie, Yin County. [Guang Yun] Yu name.　[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Hu Juanqie, the sound is hanging. 【Jade articles】Jade color. [Guang Yun] Shi Ciyu.　Another name. [Later Han·Zhao Qi Biography] Zhong Chang serves Tang Heng brother Xuan, the captain of Jingzhao Huya.　[Jiyun] Hu Qianqie, Yinxian. Last name also.
